tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    energy_generated DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_output DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_sources (
    source_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    value FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE solar_panels (
    panel_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    capacity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    efficiency FLOAT NOT NULL,
    status BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE wind_turbines (
    turbine_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    capacity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    blade_length FLOAT NOT NULL,
    cut_in_speed FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE hydro_power_plants (
    plant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    capacity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    water_flow_rate FLOAT NOT NULL,
    efficiency FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE biomass_facilities (
    facility_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    capacity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    feedstock_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    emissions_reduction FLOAT NOT NULL
)
